transArray.content: The hotel environment is pretty good

Dear distinguished guest, thank you for your recognition of the hotel. The hotel is very close to the newly opened Beijing Chaoyang Railway Station. It only takes 8 minutes to get there. The transportation at the door is also very convenient. There are many places to go out to eat. The hotel is Hanting Version 2.7 is a new product in Hanting. The breakfast is very rich and there is a self-service free laundry. We look forward to your next stay.
